Source code for lib.models.mine

# -*- coding: UTF-8 -*-



[docs]class Mine(object):
    """A mine object.

    Attributes:
        x (int): the mine position in X.
        y (int): the mine position in Y.
        owner (int): the hero's id that owns this mine.
    """

    def __init__(self, x, y):
        """Constructor.

        Args:
            x (int): the mine position in X.
            y (int): the mine position in Y.
        """
        self.x = x
        self.y = y
        self.owner = None
